PrivacyRequest.name: PrivacyRequest
PrivacyRequest.description: See details and monitor the status of Data Subject Access Requests made in Privacy Center.

CompletedDateTime.description: The date and time when the request was completed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Privacy Request.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

RelatedRecord.description: The Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) or Right to Be Forgotten request (RTBF) record related to the request.

StartedDateTime.description: The date and time when the request was started.

Status.description: Represents the status of the request.

TargetRecord.description: The record that is listed in the request.

Type.description: Represents the type of request that was made.
